exchange.ProcessLogin: The entered amount exceeded the limit. Please login. If you don't have an account, you can create a free one by pressing “Create free account” button.
exchange.ProcessReg: The entered amount exceeded the limit. It is required to be registred and verified. Continue by filling your password below.

ProcessRegAndExchange.title: Register and get exchange benefits.
ProcessRegAndExchange.descr: Still don’t have an account? Create a free one for free and get access to transaction history of all your exchanges and take advantage of other exclusive benefits.

Testimonials.gratitude: Over 4149 customers have left us a 5/5 star rating. Thank you.

become-partner.sub-head:
Explore a wide range of partnership advantages
and be part of amazing crypto world.
become-partner.block2-text:
After registration, you will be given a unique link that you can send as an invitation to our exchange platform.

Our system will recognize that your partner has come to a page through your link and will
automatically send you a commission that you can withdraw to any wallet.
become-partner.block3-title: Become a Large Customer of Unicash or Other Currency Under Special Condition
become-partner.block3-text:
Do you already work as a currency or trading exchange?
The fundamental task of such exchanges is to resolve the cash flow.
Unicash can help you with connecting wide network of payment services.

Explore how Unicash works and contact us if you are interested in wholesale prices
become-partner.block4-title: Start Your Own Exchange Platform, We’ll Help You.
become-partner.block4-text:
Every exchange on the global market is an important service for cryptocurrency users, as it helps to build infrastructure and compare price level.

The requested service is a guarantee of an interesting profit.

We offer an opportunity of setting up a partner exchange platform that would be our partner, as the demand for our services often exceeds our capacity.

Read more about our partner exchange platform here and if interested, write us here:

invite-friends.send-generated-link: Send the generated link to your friends as an invitation to our exchange platform. Our system will recognize that your partner has come to a page through your link and will automatically give you commission that you can withdraw to any wallet. Do you have any other questions? Check FAQ section or contact technical support.

fees-discounts.sub-head:
All fees and discounts in one clear table.
If you have any questions, don’t hesitate to contact our technical support.

discount-program.sub-head:
Register and get dynamic disccount.
The more you change, the greater discount.
discount-program.title: We Have 5 Level Discount Levels
discount-program.info: 2 USD to exchange left to get 3% discount.

prepaid-card.sub-head:
Get access to wide variety of benefits
with the prepaid card. Without any commitment!
prepaid-card.title: Explore The Benefits of Your Prepaid Card!

process5.sub-title: Send the amount to the displayed wallet address. Do not confirm the payment until you really pay the amount.
process5.info-instruction: If you don’t follow the payment instructions, the transaction may take longer to process. Press the “Money sent” button only when you actually send the money.

popup-question.title: Did you really send the amount?

popup-money-sent.title: Congratulations! Money sent.
popup-money-sent.sub-title: Go to the following link to check the transaction status
popup-money-sent.history: Use transaction history section in your account.

popup-fail.title: Something has gone wrong!
popup-fail.sub-title: During the transaction an unknown error occured.
